title: Bug 15899 - Close all saved does not work all the time
OB: When using build 20020508 with the latest UI code, the Close All Saved option from the file menu sometimes fails to close all the open editors.
EB: The Close All Saved option should close all the open editors, regardless of whether the files have been saved or not.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Use build 20020508 with the latest UI code.
2. Close all the currently open editors.
3. Create a new file (e.g., f1.txt).
4. Select 'Close All Saved' from the file menu.
